name: RUINER (itch)
description:
Is the light red? How cruel, one cannot dry in red light.

The Ladder is nonlife. There  is no time so you need not hurry. Moving down, where more powerful demiurges haunt and play.

There is no luck. The weight alone is yours to hold. 

You will perish and you will return. Not until you find Paradise are you allowed to fade. The light in the Rungs blinds your passage towards peace.

Ruiner is a rules-light Dungees and Draggys retro-clone. This is a soft launch/ashcan that is still in development but can be used if you want. Usable Minis and sample Rung to come. Will most likely expand at some point. I'm freakin' workin' on it !

Obvious inspo from Whitehack, OSE, Bastards, The Vanilla Game and all those other big, beautiful lil clones out there. To be described as "Soulsian" only, thank you.
